entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts. Mentioned as having objects that Voldemort might have been interested in.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts. Mentioned as having objects that Voldemort might have been interested in.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story. Mentioned as being interested in finding objects from the founders.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character who is a teacher at Hogwarts and has knowledge about Voldemort's intentions.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where the story takes place. Mentioned as being a place where Voldemort might have been interested in finding objects.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is having a conversation with Dumbledore about Voldemort's intentions.

relationships.description: Voldemort was interested in finding objects from Gryffindor, as mentioned by Dumbledore.
Dumbledore has knowledge about Hogwarts and Voldemort's intentions.
